# status

**Instance Property**

The status of the player.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: WKAudioFilePlayerStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayerStatus/failed], the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayer/error] property contains the reason for the failure.

## Getting Information About the Player

- **currentItem**: The player’s current item.
- **error**: An error that describes the cause of a failure.

items.description: An error that describes the cause of a failure.
